content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. You need to tell me the item you find after your movements. Please provide only the name of the item. Note that your answer should include only the name of the item and no other words.

You have been given a circular path consisting of 10 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a brass. Moving in a clockwise direction from the brass, the elements on the path are a loggerhead sea turtle, a Bluetick Coonhound, a newt, a sloth bear, a Sealyham Terrier, a kimono, an Alaskan Malamute, an axolotl, and a tray. Starting from the newt, you move around the ring by 7 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 3 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 4 steps in a clockwise direction. What will you find?

You have been given a circular path consisting of 10 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a brass. I find a tray. I am sorry, but I do not have access to the specific steps you take to move around the path. I only know the items that are on the path and your initial position. Please provide more information if you need assistance with your question.
